editorialNotes.short: Something's very wrong here. Can you get out alive?

editorialNotes.standard: The concept behind Kingdom Rush Frontiers is exceptionally simple: take the same great ideas, visual style, and fiendishly difficult tower defense that millions fell in love with in the original game and improve it by adding tons of incredible content. Frontiers packs new heroes, settings, towers, and tons of fresh enemies to fend off, making the frenzied action even harder to put down.

editorialNotes.tagline: Or just bundle up and enjoy the ride.

editorialNotes.standard: Badland is an eerie sidescroller in which you guide a nondescript creature through creepy and perilous environments. Thanks to simple controls and obvious objectives, the game is instantly accessible, but winding levels and unique power-ups make each stage an exercise in careful timing and hasty strategies. As the gameplay evolves and becomes increasingly bizarre, Badland remains incredibly fun.

Sure, there are skateboarding games that let you pull 900s from telephone wires, then land in a manual, collecting millions of points. But when you want realism and complexity, you want True Skate. For years, True Axis’ skateboarding simulator has been letting us ollie, grind and kickflip with our fingers. Competing with your friends, scouting gaps and completing missions is great fun, but the true reward is perfecting a line and nailing incredible tricks with just the right swipes.

advisories: Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: You’re a goat, free to run wild and cause mayhem in a virtual town. And trust us: that premise leads to tons of hilarious moments and stunts. We’ve crashed parties, head-butted cars, bounced on trampolines, and done a million other goofy things in this outrageous sandbox game.

editorialNotes.tagline: A classic that never gets old

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

Clean up Gotham one brick at a time

ios.subtitle: It’s not a bug, it’s a feature

editorialNotes.standard: This acclaimed platformer motivates you to to brush off mistakes and charge back into battle again and again.

Limbo is a gripping blend of stark, haunting landscapes, bizarre characters and unsettling sounds. With clever puzzle design, an intriguing narrative and an excellent touch-screen control system, it’s as rewarding to play as it is interesting to look at and listen to.
editorialNotes.short: Dark, haunting, beautiful. This'll stay with you long after it's over.

name: Fury Unleashed
artistName: Awesome Games Studio Sp. z o.o.

editorialNotes.tagline: A wild sprint to the finish

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Join the battle for Bikini Bottom

editorialNotes.short: In a dystopian sci-fi future, a voiceless singer takes up the game’s titular sword to take down an evil conspiracy.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: There's something for everyone here. Like a balance of tactics and action that lets us jump in shooting or hone the perfect strategy. Endless customization options—plus a beefy campaign and 7-on-7 online matches—mean we'll never run out of targets. And with a controller and Apple TV, we're dominating these battlefields on the big screen.
Catchy music, incredible combo-filled combat, co-op play, and a blast of nostalgic spirit ensures this classic brawling series still packs a punch.

ios.subtitle: Feed Hungry Fish And Grow Big

editorialNotes.tagline: Put an end to the terror

editorialNotes.short: Bend the rules and knock out opponents in this fun retro-style game.

editorialNotes.standard: Tiny Wings has been a longtime favorite of ours, thanks to its gentle vibe, fantastic music, and surprisingly awesome one-touch gameplay. Outrunning the sun across procedurally generated islands is rewarding and relaxing, and we love the added challenge of the four-bird race mode. The game’s vivid, vibrant colors absolutely dazzle on Apple TV—we feel like we’re meeting our flightless friends for the first time again.

editorialNotes.short: Plan your attack with robots and ricochets.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Bag your bounties and save the settlers.

editorialNotes.standard: Great balls of fire! It’s enormously fun playing as mages in this fast-paced, pixel-art roguelike.
